text: Azariah became the father of Amariah. Amariah became the father of Ahitub.
After these events Timothy assembled another army and camped opposite Raphon, on the other side of the wadi.
Let your ‘Yes' mean ‘Yes,' and your ‘No' mean ‘No.' Anything more is from the evil one.

Likewise, no one pours new wine into old wineskins. Otherwise, the new wine will burst the skins, and it will be spilled, and the skins will be ruined.
Moreover, the Father who sent me has testified on my behalf. But you have never heard his voice nor seen his form,
After him came Judas the Galilean at the time of the census. He also drew people after him, but he too perished and all who were loyal to him were scattered.
